heading: YOU'RE FOCUSED ON YOUR HEALTH
Be it through Zumba, pole dancing, or long hours of meditation, you won’t let quarantine stop you from getting fitter, stronger and faster than ever before.
ARIES
You’re busy cooking up a storm
From Dalgona coffee to Nutella-laced banana bread, you've been treating your quarantine crew to some delicious treats.
TAURUS
Gemini
You’re keeping up with your social calendar
From sangria nights to poker parties, you've been hosting a bunch of unmissable online celebrations for the people you miss most.
CANCER
You’re binge-watching old movies online
You've been enjoying high school romances and foreign films about star-crossed lovers, with generous servings of popcorn and boxes of tissue, haven’t you?
LEO
You’re indulging in the ultimate self-care routine
What does your self-love look like today, Leo—rice water hair treatment, multani mitti face mask or a freshly made coffee skin scrub?
VIRGO
You’re kickstarting initiatives to help the needy
The size of the project doesn't matter. What everyone will remember on the other side of the health crisis is how you made the experience of living through a pandemic easier for so many.
LIBRA
You’re giving your home a makeover
Governed by Venus, your zodiac sign can't get enough of good aesthetics. Maybe it's finally time to pop open that can of paint you bought over a year ago.
SCORPIO
You’re giving online dating a shot
You love your alone time, but human interaction is something you can't do without. For single Scorpios, the lockdown has brought the chance to explore relationships in a fresh way.
SAGITTARIUS
You’re exploring the world virtually
Travel shows and books are your jam right now, and you’ve probably been spending hours surfing the internet for interesting holiday spots you can check out post lockdown.
CAPRICORN
You’re upskilling with free online courses
When you're not busy hosting Zoom meetings with your colleagues, you’re glued to your laptop, breezing through multiple online courses at a superhuman speed.
AQUARIUS
You’re working through your extensive book list
While you may have already re-read your favourite classics by now, the future weeks may see you exploring new genres that you've never had time to before.
PISCES
You’re honing your artistic skills

There's a good chance that your guest room has already been converted into a makeshift quarantine studio, quickly filling up with charcoal sketches, watercolour paintings or beautifully sculpted clay bowls.
